website_summaries.verdict: Durable traditionally-designed tennis shoes with a good build and plenty of style. However, they may not work for those who need extra support.
pros: These durable leather-and-textile tennis shoes have a lightweight feel with a fit that is comfortable for most
They also sport an attractive, traditional style
cons: Somewhat lacking when it comes to arch support
Sizes can be unpredictable, as owners have reported them to be too narrow, too large, or just right

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, stylish but no cushion
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are very stylish and on trend. I have received many compliments on them even though you might not think black sneakers would receive much notice. They are very light weight. However, they are slightly narrow and do not offer much support. So, as much as I would like to wear them everywhere and all day, in reality they become uncomfortable after a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M. Barber

customer_reviews.title: FAKE??
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like the same shoe bought at a retailer and $30 less, but...upon closer inspection the stitching inside the shoe around the edge of the insole was totally different. Darker thread and visibly hand stitched!! If it seems too good to be true...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Run bigger than athletic sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. Couldn't believe how light they are. Super comfortable from the start. I have a standing desk and these are perfect. Somehow they provide just enough support. Also great for casual walks. They don't look like typical athletic shoes so I can wear them at the office without feeling too casual. Highly recommend. Will probably buy another pair. I usually size up in athletic sneakers to a 9 but I'm glad I ordered an 8.5 because they are plenty roomy. Order your dress shoe size!
customer_reviews.author: jerseyJD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pair of Cole Haan.  Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable pair of tennis and walking shoes I have ever owned. Absolutely love it. It fit the moment I stepped into them. No need to break them in. I wear 5.5M size but I ordered 6M for the ankle socks. Do not regret it. They fit perfectly, light and comfy. Now looking for another pair of 6M walking shoes but have not found the size, color nor the right price yet. Will keep looking. Amazon, you done good ... again. Highly recommend it. From a very loyal Amazon customer.
customer_reviews.author: Judy C Miao

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very lightweight. They’re lighter than my Teva flip flops. They’re so cute and well made. I cannot tell how comfortable they are because i did not use them as they’re too big and i need to return. I wanted to order the smaller size but they’re not on sale. I have other cole haans that are size 8.5 but these were just too big. Update: So I ordered an pair of size 8s and they are still roomy but I think a 7.5 would be too small. They are not as comfortable as I expected because there is not enough cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing and Placement of Foot Issues
customer_reviews.text: This company's shoe sizing is way off. For instance, I am an 8.5 size in every sneaker out there, but for Cole Haan I am a 7.5. Also, I didn't know this when I was trying on the sneaker at the retail store before buying online, that when you really get a good pace in walking in the sneaker over a long period of time, that your feet will slip/ move towards the front of the shoe itself. So keep that in mind. But maybe I will try a different type of sock so as to prevent my feet from shifting in the sneaker. Other than that, the product is snazzy. I love the quality and look.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: This shoes at really comfortable and I would totally recommend them
customer_reviews.text: This shoes at really comfortable and I would totally recommend them. They fit as expected, but in case you are between two sizes I would go for the smaller one. With sneakers I always choose the large one, but on this case, this shoes are spacious and a little bit large. To consider, leather ones are slightly shinny, but the soft colours are made of a material that get dirty very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ximena

customer_reviews.title: Great color but CHEAP FEEL
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give these just 2.5 stars and that’s only because they are exactly the color in the picture and I love that. Other than that, they are cheaply made and offer no support--definitely way overpriced. Do not recommend them unless you are buying them only for the color.
customer_reviews.author: Elderberry

customer_reviews.title: My favorite little shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wear these all the time. Very comfortable and good for walking or shopping all day. My only complaint is that they don't wear very well, they are already getting worn out and I've had them about 5 or 6 months. Still a good shoe if you're looking for a low profile sneaker. Not a support shoe though.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnnFYI

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous, Comfortable, Good Looking
customer_reviews.text: A friend has these on, and I coveted them so I hunted them down online and bought myself a pair. Spur of the moment purchase, and I am thrilled I did it! They are comfortable AND stylish. A bit of a "Chucks" look, but cleaner and don't make my feet look big. Not super padded but if someone prefers more padding, that's what insoles are for. Love them, and wondering if I can find a pair in an alternate, darker color for fall/winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered my regular size and they were perfect. I now have 2 colors and cant wait ...
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered a size down, but my toe was on the edge and I could barely wiggle my toes. I ordered my regular size and they were perfect. I now have 2 colors and cant wait to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: BKGlam

customer_reviews.title: Odio
customer_reviews.text: Many compliments....they go with anything, and are great for an old lady who can't wear very many different types of shoes....especially "dress" shoes. This is my second pair....2 different sizes for swollen feet in the evening or early am! Very soft and comfortable....thinking about getting a couple more pairs in case they're discontinued!
customer_reviews.author: odio

customer_reviews.title: Odio loves these sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after being so happy with the same ones in gold. I just wish the same shoes came in more colors.... I'd buy them all! Very soft and comfortable, and an amazing price for Cole Haan shoes of any type! Great for old ladies who can still reach to tie, but need comfort!
customer_reviews.author: odio

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers. They're lightweight, very comfortable, and you can dress them up or down. The suede patch in the back adds an interesting detail. Saw the exact ones in a major department store for $130.00, so the price is great for these. But note - I've always been a 6.5 in every style of shoe, whether it be sneakers, boots, high heels, etc. I initially ordered a 6.5 and they were huge on me. I had to return and re-purchase them, but the seller was great about it. The 6 fits perfectly; I would definitely recommend ordering a half size down.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: very stylish and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried them first at the store, but they didn’t have in white as I wanted, so ordered online. It’s true size, fits perfectly and looks very trendy! I wear then with dress as well as with jeans, beautiful! they are so light and soft, perfect even for Miami summer.
customer_reviews.author: Larisa

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of Cole Haan Grandpro trainers, love this shoes. I tried them in the shop and had to buy 1/2 size smaller since they ran a bit big as they told me in the shop. Would buy in all colours.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia GS

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes! So comfortable & light. I ordered the 8 1/2 and it fits perfectly, normally my size. I also tried the 9 but it was too big. So happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Nice classic go to sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: The leather wasn’t as subtle as I would have thought but still a very nice comfy sneaker. The laces were a little stiff but appears the will relax with use. Would be interesting to compare next to same shoe in store to see if any difference in in quality buying on line. Like the shoe and kept anyway,
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful But Big
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tennis shoe, well made and stylish. I purchased for a trip to wear on the plane but unfortunately they were too big and I had to return. I would recommend these but order at least a half size smaller than your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: D. Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great comfy shoe! So very lite weight! Fit : I usually wear a 9 but the 81/2 is perfect - so maybe a 39.5 Euro sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar47

customer_reviews.title: Best price and size.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and soft. If you have a bunion or larger bone on your big toe, this is the shoe. Very stylish. My mom had me order it after seeing and trying it on at a department store in town. How ever they didn’t have the right size. The price was $150. She pocketed $70 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Monina S. Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Fun Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These a really fun shoes. I am recovering from a foot injury and was concerned about getting an orthotic to fit. The full size don't work but the 3/4 length work well. I love them with jeans, white or tan pants. The quality of the leather is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: FLBoater

customer_reviews.title: So glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Cole haan makes the comfiest shoes! Their heels are the kind you can wear all day- I grab them before any others- so decided to check out their sneakers. So glad I did! Ridiculously comfortable and lightweight, and I was leery of the velvet but actually really like it and it's not obvious from far away. Haven't worn them in the rain or snow due to the material, but absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amy P

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes all over Europe. They are lightweight but provide great support and are extremely comfortable for long distance walking. I was surprised to find out that they were much more comfortable than my Ecco walking shoes, which were almost twice as expensive. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: shanamc

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate description: it states that these sneakers come in either leather, nubuck or suede. The black ones I got are- velvet, which defeats the purpose of wearing them in warmer weather. True to size and very lightweight. Not much of arch support. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Tariel

customer_reviews.title: Not good for square toes
customer_reviews.text: Had to give to a friend. After wearing a few times my toes felt really cramped. However I have a boxy foot
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight! If you are between sizes, go ...
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight! If you are between sizes, go with the smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Loki

customer_reviews.title: The color of the sneakers is totally different from the ...
customer_reviews.text: The color of the sneakers is totally different from the image posted and it is not a matter of monitor resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing snickers!
customer_reviews.text: This are really confortable, and easy to match with everything. I used them for the first time on a trip to Europe, walking around 8/10 miles a day and they were just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size! Clean Modern Look!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect all-occasion sneaker. Comfortable and stylish. I even use them for a dressy night out when I can't wear heels. They are a welcomed look that is clean and modern while sneakers are trending. Laces are a bit "stiff" but easy to clean. I am a proper size 8, and the size 8 is a perfect fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Think Ink

customer_reviews.title: This pair is extremely light and very comfortable, no breaking in necessary
customer_reviews.text: This pair is extremely light and very comfortable, no breaking in necessary. It's sleek design did not make my feet look bulky at all. I suggest you size down by 1/2. I wear a size 6B in ColeHaan sneakers (Hendrix) but ordered a 5.5 and the fit is perfect. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: senyorina_p

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color shown in pictures
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for, shoes are comfortable. Colour is not as shown in the product details. The colour shown perhaps is for "Seashell". There is no tinge of pink in "Sandshell", be careful when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Walked all over NYC in these shoes and have zero complaints. They are stylish and comfortable, and excellent quality. Will be getting the white for spring/summer!
customer_reviews.author: JRH

customer_reviews.title: they look like they are a 4 years old after wearingthem for ...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot clean them just for normal wear to office. I purchased leather cleaner for them and it doesn't do anything. Nothing works. they look like they are a 4 years old after wearingthem for a few months
customer_reviews.author: beverly haefner

customer_reviews.title: White sneaks
customer_reviews.text: Easy to keep clean. They were a little narrow feeling at first but after the first wear they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Allyn D.

customer_reviews.title: Great casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these for casual dressing. I have narrow feet with high arches and I wore these right out of the box, walking and standing all day with no soreness, aches, or blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde's Gal

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shoes!!! I have gotten so many compliments on them from women and men alike. The fit and comfort are great and the maple sugar color is simply beautiful. I highly recommend these shoes for anyone contemplating getting them.
customer_reviews.author: TankerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I use custom orthotics. They fit well with them. They look so cute in pictures too. I took them to Europe.
customer_reviews.author: SarahB

customer_reviews.title: Dingy white
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is self looked old and dingy white. The shoelaces are white. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kkarsted

customer_reviews.title: Love these very stylish yet classic sneakers Great quality and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these very stylish yet classic sneakers Great quality and well made as expected From The company that has made topsiders for what seems like an eternity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: At first a little stiff. As I wore them they got more comfortable. I wear them all day and they feel like comfortable slippers. I love this brand.
customer_reviews.author: KAN

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: The fit was comparable to Nike sizes, fit perfect. Wish they had more support but the cuteness factor wins every time! Great for short walks. Many compliments on these!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes they are comfortable and fit just right.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes!!! They fit perfectly and are very comfortable even without socks.

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker for the weekends
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sneaker, so comfortable. I am normally a 9 but an 8.5 fit perfectly... Looks cute with jeans...

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but little support
customer_reviews.text: Super cute shoes, but the fit of these shoes didn't work for me. They provided little support and made me feel like I was pronating a lot when I walked.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Amazon i love amazon, thank you for those great shoes! Very confy great quality everybody tells me how besutiful they are

customer_reviews.title: It is my third pair and I hope they continue making this shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and I prefer the look of a tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Driehaus

customer_reviews.title: Sexy with no Sole
customer_reviews.text: Perfect look but too lightweight. You can get an ouch when walking on some large gravel/rocks. Wear 2 socks and consider extra insole. Would buy again for the appearance alone.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control - Broken insole
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality inspection. Insole was ruined and sent out as a brand new shoe. Have to return and probably won’t get replacement for our vacation.

customer_reviews.title: I thought I would like them more than I do
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would like them more than I do. Kind of disappointed considering the cost. They clean up well (smudges) with Magic Eraser

I am not sure how to clean them and being so light like, they need cleaning. Also, the color is more pink than I thought from the picture.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, great color (I ordered the gunmetal)
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, great color (I ordered the gunmetal). Fits well and is fairly comfortable. These are NOT LEATHER! At least not the gunmetal color. They have a distinct plastic smell. The description says "synthetic" and then "leather, suede". No suede on the shoe either. I think the shoe is expensive for plastic. Will probably return and keep my all leather Ecco's.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I was sent two totally different pairs of shoes before I finally received the ones I originally ordered....not sure how that could have happened.....but I was happy to finally get these. They are very light weight & comfortable. I was looking for something to wear with black pants & these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Beckineagle

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a trip to Europe. We did a LOT of walking and these shoes were a big help — very comfortable. I have narrow feet, especially in the heel, and the shoes fit well without slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Patrick

product_meta.title: Cole Haan Women's GrandPro Tennis Leather Lace OX Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description:
Fashion sneaker lace up

With nearly 80 years in the business and hundreds of points of distribution in the U.S., Cole Haan is one of America's premier luxury brands. Founded in 1928 as a collaboration between Trafton Cole and Eddie Haan, Cole Haan epitomized artisan quality and impeccable craftsmanship during a time when style was everything. Originally, Cole Haan was a men's footwear label that captured the essence of the 20s spirit with beautifully-designed and well-made shoes for the dapper gentleman. Today, Cole Haan brings that heritage to all of its products, including men's and women's dress and casual footwear, belts, hosiery, handbags, small leather goods, outerwear and sunglasses.
feature_bullets: Textile covered footbed for comfort and breathability.
Rubber pods in heel and forefoot for traction.
